sentences.en: Direct priMary legislation is largely permissive rather than prescriptive.
sentences.cn: 直接的原始立法主要是许可性的而非说明性的.

sentences.en: It is to pass permissive ability to use beforehand inside KTV, have very big distinction.
sentences.cn: KTV里面就是事先经过许可才能使用, 有很大区别.

sentences.en: Markets are the most permissive places in the world.
sentences.cn: 市场是这个世界上最放纵的地方.

sentences.en: Public access is the most permissive access level.
sentences.cn: 公共访问是允许的最高访问级别.

sentences.en: Single parents are more likely to be permissive.
sentences.cn: 单亲家庭的父母更容易放任自己的孩子。

sentences.en: Single transducer's multi - meterage has more permissive possiblities what make for a wider choice of applications.
sentences.cn: 单个传感器的多点测量方法拥有更大的自由度,为该装置的应用提供了更多的选择范围.

sentences.en: The Financial Services Authority ( FSA ) was one of the most permissive big supervisors in the world.
sentences.cn: 金融服务监管局 ( FSA ) 是世界上管理最宽松的大型监管机构.

sentences.en: These cells exhibited the glycopeptide pattern characteristic of transformed cells when grown at the permissive temperature.
sentences.cn: 温度下生长时,具有转化细胞所特有的糖肽图谱.

sentences.en: These cells exhibited the glycopetide pattern characteristic of transformed cells when grown at the permissive temperature.
sentences.cn: 这些细胞在许可的温度下生长时,具有转化细胞所特有的糖肽图谱.

sentences.en: Transplantation of highly permissive Schwann cell - enriched peripheral nerve grafts may enhance regeneration in spinal cord injury.
sentences.cn: 而移植含有高浓度施万细胞的周围神经节段则可能可以加强脊索损伤的再生.

words.tran_cn: 许可的；自由的；宽容的；（两性关系）放纵的

trans.tran_cn: 宽大的，放任的，自由的，容许的
trans.tran_en: not strict, and allowing behaviour that many other people would disapprove of
